messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'fetchTasks'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [fetchTasks, user]

messages.message: 'error' is defined but never used.
'error' is defined but never used.
Use "@ts-expect-error" instead of "@ts-ignore", as "@ts-ignore" will do nothing if the following line is error-free.

suggestions.desc: Replace "@ts-ignore" with "@ts-expect-error".
